jarvis.name: IP Info
jarvis.shortDescription: Show your current IP Info and Search for IP Address
jarvis.longDescription: Will display you IP Address and more information about this IP address, including Geo Location, ASN, ISP. You can also search for a specific IP.

uiCmds.name: IP Info
uiCmds.description: Display your current IP addres and detailed information. Search for other IP address.
